thread.title: Want to meet Sheikh Hamdan? Visit this Dubai beach
thread.title_full: Want to meet Sheikh Hamdan? Visit this Dubai beach

title: Want to meet Sheikh Hamdan? Visit this Dubai beach

persons.name: hamdan bin mohammed bin rashid al maktoum

text:
Want to meet Sheikh Hamdan? Visit this Dubai beach Web Team /Dubai   Share 
Photos from Instagram/faz3 These pictures will surely make you want to step out and enjoy the weather. Rain and cool weather have been the talk of the town with many people spending their time outside home this weekend, including the royalty. Sheikh Hamdan bin Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Crown Prince of Dubai, who is known for his photography skills and as an avid adventurer, spent the day at Jumeirah Beach and posted some breathtaking shots on his Instagram page on Friday. These pictures will surely make you want to step out and enjoy the weather. A few days back, the Crown Prince took to Instagram to post this stunning timelapse video as a sea of clouds swept past the world's tallest tower, Burj Khalifa.
